title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials, and the session is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Check that login is successful, user is redirected to the appropriate dashboard or onboarding, and session is persisted

title: User Authentication Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username/email or password, and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login failure notification or error message is shown

title: Access Protected Routes Without Authentication
description: Attempt to access protected application routes when not authenticated and verify redirection to Auth page.

steps.description: Navigate directly to a protected route URL without active session
Verify user is redirected to the Auth login screen

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement on Routes
description: Verify that users with different roles can only access routes permitted for their role according to RBAC settings.

steps.description: Login as ADM user and navigate to various application routes
Assert access to all ADM-permitted routes is granted
Logout and login as Marketing user
Attempt to access restricted routes (e.g., Configurations, RBAC settings)
Verify access to these routes is denied with messages or redirection

title: Role-Based UI Element Permission Enforcement
description: Verify that interface elements (buttons, menu items) are shown or hidden according to the logged-in user's role.

steps.description: Login as ADM user and open Sidebar and other menus
Verify visibility of all admin UI elements
Logout and login as Gestores
Verify restricted UI elements are hidden or disabled

title: Campaign Creation Wizard Normal Flow
description: Test the multi-step campaign creation wizard to ensure data is accepted correctly at each step, persists, and campaign saves successfully.

steps.description: Login as authorized user and navigate to Campaigns
Start a new campaign creation wizard
Complete steps: basic info, budget allocation, ad groups, creative assets, and review
Verify data is saved at each step and visible when navigating back and forth
Finish wizard and submit campaign
Verify campaign is created and success notification shown

title: Campaign Creation Wizard Handles Incomplete Data
description: Verify the wizard prevents progression or submission when required data is missing or invalid.

steps.description: Start campaign creation wizard and omit required fields in a step
Attempt to proceed to the next step
Verify validation errors shown and wizard does not proceed
Attempt to submit campaign with incomplete or invalid data
Verify submission is blocked with error messages

title: Campaign Wizard Data Persistence During Navigation
description: Verify that campaign data entered in the wizard is persisted when navigating between steps or leaving and returning.

steps.description: Enter data in a campaign wizard step
Navigate to a different step and then back
Verify previously entered data remains populated
Leave wizard and return to continue
Verify campaign wizard progress is persisted and data intact

title: Leads Import via CSV Valid Data
description: Test that leads CSV import accepts valid data linked to existing campaigns and accounts and adds leads correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Leads management
Import a valid CSV file with lead data matching existing campaigns and accounts
Verify leads are imported successfully and visible with correct details
Check import success notification

title: Leads Import via CSV Handles Invalid Data
description: Verify that invalid or unmatched lead records in CSV import are ignored and appropriate warnings are shown.

steps.description: Try importing a CSV with leads having invalid campaign/account data or malformed fields
Verify invalid records are skipped
Verify success report shows counts of imported and ignored entries
Check warning notification or error messages are shown

title: Dashboard KPI Display Accuracy
description: Verify that the dashboard displays correct and updated KPIs including investment, impressions, clicks, and conversions filtered by brand and time period.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard page
Select various brands and time periods in filters
Verify KPI values update accordingly and reflect correct aggregated data
Verify trend charts refresh with the selected filters

title: Budget CRUD Operations with Validations
description: Verify creation, reading, updating, and deletion of monthly and detailed budgets. Validate fields like status and observations enforce rules.

steps.description: Navigate to Budget management
Create a monthly budget with valid values
Verify budget is saved and displayed
Update the budget's status and observations
Verify updates are saved correctly
Attempt to enter invalid budget values
Verify validation errors prevent saving
Delete a budget entry
Verify entry is removed and deletion confirmation is shown

title: Optimization History Tracking and Updates
description: Verify that optimization entries record creator, linked campaigns and creatives, and allow status updates tracked with responsible user.

steps.description: Navigate to Optimization section
Create a new optimization entry linked to a campaign and creative
Verify creator's identity is recorded and entry appears in history
Update the status of the optimization and assign a responsible user
Verify status change is saved and visible

title: Reports Filtering and Metric Aggregation
description: Verify cascading filters for brand, platform, and account in Reports, and that metric aggregation and trend charts update accordingly.

steps.description: Go to Reports page
Apply filters by brand
Verify available platforms filter updates accordingly
Apply platform filter
Verify account options update accordingly
Select an account filter
Confirm metrics and charts refresh with aggregated data

title: Report Import with Meta Ads CSV Valid Data
description: Verify importing a Meta Ads CSV file normalizes dates weekly and parses monetary and percentage metrics accurately.

steps.description: Import a valid Meta Ads CSV file in Reports
Verify dates are normalized to weekly representation
Check monetary and percentage values are parsed and displayed correctly
Verify import success notification is shown

title: Media File Upload and Management
description: Test that users can upload media files using the public storage client and that uploads do not require session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to Media management module
Upload various media files (images, videos)
Verify files upload successfully and are listed
Simulate session expiry and retry upload, verify upload still works

title: API Uniform Supabase Error Handling
description: Verify that backend API services handle Supabase errors uniformly and propagate exceptions to the frontend for proper messaging.

steps.description: Simulate Supabase backend failure or bad request in API calls
Verify API returns standardized error responses
Check frontend displays appropriate error messages or notifications

title: Frontend Loading States and Error Messages
description: Verify that UI components show loading indicators during async operations and display meaningful error messages on failures.

steps.description: Trigger various data fetches and mutations like dashboard, campaign creation, leads import
Verify loading indicators appear appropriately during data loading
Simulate API failure
Confirm user-facing error messages or toast notifications are displayed

title: Responsive UI and Sidebar Collapse Persistence
description: Verify the UI is responsive on various screen sizes and the sidebar collapse state is persisted in localStorage.

steps.description: Resize browser window to desktop, tablet, and mobile widths
Verify UI elements adapt layout and remain usable
Toggle sidebar collapse state
Reload the page
Verify sidebar collapse state persists correctly

title: Atomic CRUD Operations with User Notifications
description: Verify all create, read, update, and delete CRUD operations are atomic and users receive success or failure toasts accordingly.

steps.description: Perform each CRUD operation in different modules (Campaigns, Budgets, Leads, Optimizations)
Verify data integrity is maintained (atomicity) and UI shows toast messages confirming operation result
Trigger backend failures during CRUD
Verify rollback occurs and failure notification is presented to user
